content:
I'd be happy to help you set reminders for your family game night.

Since I'm a text-based AI, I can't directly set reminders on your device or calendar. However, I can guide you on how to set reminders on your preferred calendar or reminder app.

Here are a few options:

**Option 1: Google Calendar**

* Open Google Calendar on your device
* Click on the "+" icon to create a new event
* Enter "Family Game Night" as the event title
* Set the start time to the desired time on Fridays (e.g., 6:00 pm)
* Set the duration to the length of your game night (e.g., 2 hours)
* Select "Fridays" as the recurring day
* Set a reminder for 30 minutes before the event (or at a time that works for you)
* Click "Save" to create the event

**Option 2: Apple Reminders (for iOS devices)**

* Open the Reminders app on your iPhone or iPad
* Tap the "+" icon to create a new reminder
* Enter "Family Game Night" as the reminder title
* Set the reminder for the desired time on Fridays (e.g., 6:00 pm)
* Tap "Repeat" and select "Every Friday"
* Set a reminder time, such as 30 minutes before the event
* Tap "Add" to create the reminder

**Option 3: Any other calendar or reminder app**

* Follow similar steps to create a new event or reminder in your preferred app
* Set the title, start time, duration, and recurrence (Fridays)
* Set a reminder time that works for you

Remember to adjust the reminder time according to your needs, so you and your family can get ready for a fun night of games!

If you need help with setting reminders for other activities, feel free to ask!
